title: #ICYMI - Esports, with NicoThePico
description: In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel…. We dive into the expanding world of Esports as hosts Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly get the science behind the screen from Nicholas "NicoThePico" Korsgård, head coach of “League of Legends” pro team PostFinance Helix, and neuroscientist Heather Berlin, PhD.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: In case you missed this episode on the Playing with Science channel….
